Outcome.DescriptionText: After closing in to the anomaly you troops were spotted and attacked by unknown enemies.

As your troops get closer to the pillar their scans immediately reveal that this structure is much older than most known structures in the galaxy. At the back of this pillar your troops discover an active energy source - they activate it. Upon activation one of your men is targetted by the pillar. A massive beam engulfes the soldier and large amounts of information is downloaded into his brain. Suddenly the pillar deactivates and the energy source is burned out. This discovery grants your empire a 5% bonus to all scientific efforts.

As your troops approach the ancient pillar, they hear a humming noise. As they get closer the noise gets louder. Suddenly a deafening sound is heard and a large bright beam shoots into the sky. You quickly realize that your presence activated a homing beacon and your sensors detect a Remnant fleet warping in. One of your soldiers spots something and grabs it before fleeing to the surface. Turns out this is a rare Artifact!

As your troops approach the ancient pillar, they notice that they aren't the first group to discover it. They see lots of electronical equipment, computers and a large Remnant power generator. One of your combat engineers activates the generator and in doing so alerts the owners of these items to your presence. A small Remnant fleet warps.
